## Private Member Functions

### analyzeBlockForNullChecks() {#a0aa4c3ee1566defb522e5a81efb25d55}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool ImplicitNullChecks::analyzeBlockForNullChecks (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl</a>&lt; NullCheck &gt; &amp; NullCheckList)</>}>
Analyze MBB to check if its terminating branch can be turned into an implicit null check.

If yes, append a description of the said null check to NullCheckList and return true, else return false.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/implicitnullchecks-cpp/#l00167">167</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/implicitnullchecks-cpp">ImplicitNullChecks.cpp</a>.

Returns AR&#95;NoAlias if <code>MI</code> memory operation does not alias with <code>PrevMI</code>, AR&#95;MayAlias if they may alias and AR&#95;WillAliasEverything if they may alias and any further memory operation may alias with <code>PrevMI</code>.

### canDependenceHoistingClobberLiveIns() {#ad746f35eac4854193631fdd32ea2443f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool ImplicitNullChecks::canDependenceHoistingClobberLiveIns (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; DependenceMI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; NullSucc)</>}>
Returns true if <code>DependenceMI</code> can clobber the liveIns in NullSucc block if it was hoisted to the NullCheck block.

This is used by caller canHoistInst to decide if DependenceMI can be hoisted safely.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/implicitnullchecks-cpp/#l00204">204</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/implicitnullchecks-cpp">ImplicitNullChecks.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### canHoistInst() {#a5a0e9eac1f084fb3ed61b409760a4ee2}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool ImplicitNullChecks::canHoistInst (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; FaultingMI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; &gt; InstsSeenSoFar, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; NullSucc, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42;&amp; Dependence)</>}>
Return true if <code>FaultingMI</code> can be hoisted from after the instructions in <code>InstsSeenSoFar</code> to before them.

Set <code><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dependence">Dependence</a></code> to a non-null value if we also need to (and legally can) hoist a dependency.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/implicitnullchecks-cpp/#l00210">210</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/implicitnullchecks-cpp">ImplicitNullChecks.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### canReorder() {#adfee430f817e41eae6c79e90e7f5a4f9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool ImplicitNullChecks::canReorder (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; A, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; B)</>}>
Helper function for <code>computeDependence</code>.

Return true if <code>A</code> and <code>B</code> do not have any dependences between them, and can be re-ordered without changing program semantics.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/implicitnullchecks-cpp/#l00086">86</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/implicitnullchecks-cpp">ImplicitNullChecks.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### computeDependence() {#ae7dfc9dc5a26c2a030ae4248cd3a8b03}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ImplicitNullChecks::DependenceResult ImplicitNullChecks::computeDependence (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; MI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; &gt; Block)</>}>
Compute a result for the following question: can <code>MI</code> be re-ordered from after <code>Insts</code> to before it.

<code>canHandle</code> should return true for all instructions in <code>Insts</code>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/implicitnullchecks-cpp/#l00115">115</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/implicitnullchecks-cpp">ImplicitNullChecks.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### insertFaultingInstr() {#a2f0e00bd225668b440e440776b6d5a99}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MachineInstr &#42; ImplicitNullChecks::insertFaultingInstr (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; MI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; HandlerMBB)</>}>
Wrap a machine instruction, MI, into a FAULTING machine instruction.

The FAULTING instruction does the same load/store as MI (defining the same register), and branches to HandlerMBB if the mem access faults. The FAULTING instruction is inserted at the end of MBB.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/implicitnullchecks-cpp/#l00169">169</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/implicitnullchecks-cpp">ImplicitNullChecks.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### isSuitableMemoryOp() {#a08f2b458663f8b2b601698fd6473e664}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>ImplicitNullChecks::SuitabilityResult ImplicitNullChecks::isSuitableMemoryOp (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp; MI, unsigned PointerReg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &#42; &gt; PrevInsts)</>}>
Return SR&#95;Suitable if <code>MI</code> a memory operation that can be used to implicitly null check the value in <code>PointerReg</code>, SR&#95;Unsuitable if <code>MI</code> cannot be used to null check and SR&#95;Impossible if there is no sense to continue lookup due to any other instruction will not be able to be used.

<code>PrevInsts</code> is the set of instruction seen since the explicit null check on <code>PointerReg</code>.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/implicitnullchecks-cpp/#l00197">197</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/implicitnullchecks-cpp">ImplicitNullChecks.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

Rewrite the null checks in NullCheckList into implicit null checks.
